sentences.en: an endless round of boring meetings
sentences.cn: 一轮没完没了的无聊会议

sentences.en: Automobiles speed in an endless stream along the boulevard.
sentences.cn: 宽阔的林荫道上,汽车川流不息.

sentences.en: He tried to be not involving himself in this endless argument.
sentences.cn: 他尽力使自己不介入这场没完没了的争论.

sentences.en: He’s been in a lot of trouble – drugs, guns, blackmail – the list is endless.
sentences.cn: 他麻烦太多了——毒品、枪支、敲诈——说都说不完。

sentences.en: Her endless nagging drove him away from home.
sentences.cn: 她无休止的唠叨抱怨逼得他离家出走了。
他的学问显然博大精深。

sentences.en: I had endless hours to knit and sew.
sentences.cn: 我整天无休止地编织缝纫。

sentences.en: In the endless flow of absolute truth there are innumerable relative truths.
sentences.cn: 在绝对真理的长河中有无数相对真理.

sentences.en: It's endless work maintaining the house in good repair.
sentences.cn: 要让房屋保持得很好是件干不完的活.

sentences.en: One is dazzled by the endless array of beautiful exhibits.
sentences.cn: 展品琳琅满目,美不胜收.

sentences.en: The child's endless crying has been wearing on my nerves all day.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子无休止的啼哭使我整天烦得要死.
这个该死的会议似乎永远也开不完。

sentences.en: The recent deterioration has been caused by an apparently endless recession.
sentences.cn: 看似永无止境的经济衰退导致了最近的恶化。

sentences.en: We hear endless injunctions to build a sense of community among staff.
sentences.cn: 我们听到上面没完没了地讲要在员工中培养一种集体归属感。

sentences.en: Wheels are in a machine driven by an endless belt.
sentences.cn: 机器的轮子是用无极带传动的.

words.tran_cn: 结束；目标；尽头；末端；死亡

phrases.tran_cn: 无穷尽的结；循环链；无端环链
无尽的爱；永无止境的爱

trans.tran_cn: 无止境的，无穷尽的，永久的，环状的
trans.tran_en: something that is endless seems to continue forever
